Create a storybook about the octopus and its journey to find its missing arm.
Develop a puzzle game where players have to help the octopus solve a series of challenges to find its missing arm.
Write a poem about the octopus and its struggle to adapt to life with only seven arms.
Create a sculpture or artwork of the octopus with only seven arms,backed by a story of its journey.
Develop a game where players take on the role of the octopus and have to use strategy to overcome obstacles and complete challenges with only seven arms.
